title: Sub organization
description: A sub-organization of a political party, not specified in more detail

type.description: Type name, indicating which schema to use for validation.

country.description: Two-letter country code of the country the party is registered in, according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

state.description: Federal state or province the sub organization is active in.

district.description: District the sub organization is active in.

city.description: City in which the sub organization is active.

region.description: Region in which the sub organization is active in (where neither district nor state fit).

urls.description: URLs for this sub organization, for websites, social media accounts, or other resources.

type.description: URL kind identifier, like WEBSITE, FACEBOOK, ...
